definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Boxes and crates shall be steel strapped.
sentences.chinese: 木箱和板条箱应该用钢带捆绑。

sentences.english: She crashed the plates angrily down on the table.
The cat was sitting on an upturned crate.
sentences.chinese: 猫儿蹲坐在倒放的板条箱上。

sentences.english: I up-ended the crate and sat on it.
Someone sticked a label on the crate.
sentences.chinese: 有人咱板条箱上贴了标签。

sentences.english: The cat was sitting on an upturned crate .
sentences.chinese: 猫儿蹲坐在倒放的板条箱上。

sentences.english: I can ship you out in my crate.
sentences.chinese: 我可以把你放在板条箱里运出去。

sentences.english: He improvised a bookcase out of crates.
sentences.chinese: 他用板条箱临时做成书架。

sentences.english: We need to order several crates for packing the all-terrain vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要订做数个板条箱来装这些全地形传动车。

sentences.english: She loaded up his collection of vintage wines into crates.
sentences.chinese: 她把他收藏的陈年佳酿装进板条箱里。

sentences.english: i just like the idea of using crates here as shelves.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢用板条箱当架子的创意。

sentences.english: We broke open the crate with a blow from the chopper.
sentences.chinese: 我们用斧头一敲就打开了板条箱。

sentences.english: All crates should be "of" a standard size.
sentences.chinese: 所有的板条箱都应该是标准型尺寸的。

sentences.english: From crate to making water takes about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 从打开板条箱到取用水只需要大约2个小时。

definition: counter for the display of goods/(Tw) container (for freight transport)
